Type.Name: TreeModelFlags

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeModelFlags extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: These flags indicate various properties of a .
Docs.remarks: These flags are returned through the property and must be static for the lifetime of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.TreeModelFlags ItersPersist = int32(1)

Docs.summary: If set, iterators survive all signals emitted by the tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.TreeModelFlags ListOnly = int32(2)

Docs.summary: If set, the model is a list only and never has children.
